column1: Baturité is a city of Ceará State
column2: Brazil 80 km (50 mi) from the state capital Fortaleza. It is located in the microregion of Baturité. The population estimate in 2004 was 31

column1: The economy of Baturité is mainly agricultural and based on the cultivation of cotton
Baturité received the first railway in the state of Ceará. It started to operate in 1873. Today
column2: this train station is a museum.
